Subskills.name: Undead Army
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of skeleton warriors.

Subskills.name: Unholy Strike
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by skeleton warriors.

Subskills.name: Zombies
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors are spawned as zombies rapidly draining their life and exploding into pieces inflicting poisoned.

Subskills.name: Command for Haste
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of skeleton warriors.

Subskills.name: Absorb Vitality
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors heal them selves for a portion of their missing life on hit.

Subskills.name: Undead Berserker
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors now deal a portion of their damage as area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Between the Ribs
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors now have a chance to dodge incoming damage.

Subskills.name: Unholy Lifeforce
Subskills.description: Increases the life of skeleton warriors.

Subskills.name: Weapons Beyond Grave
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors have a chance on attack to deal critical damage equal to your critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Undying Rage
Subskills.description: Increases skeleton warrior damage based on their missing life percentage.

Subskills.name: Last Stand
Subskills.description: Skeleton warrior life is reduced and they explode upon death unleashing bone shrapnel around them.

Subskills.name: Winds of the Dead
Subskills.description: Skeleton warriors have a chance to perform an area of effect attack with increased radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Horde of Undead
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum summon amount of skeleton warriors. Skeleton warriors damage and life is reduced.
